definition: three generations of a family/the three earliest dynasties (Xia, Shang and Zhou)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遺傳的宗法制度毋寧是儒家文化的深厚社會基礎。

sentences.english: The last one of the pure-blooded vampires of the third generation in far east.
sentences.chinese: 遠東最後一個血統純正的第三代吸血鬼。

sentences.english: Five synthesis methods of the third generation nicotinic insecticide-dinotefuran are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了第三代菸鹼類殺蟲劑呋蟲胺的5種合成方法。

sentences.english: The three leading cores have developed the unique theory of party building.
sentences.chinese: 黨的三代領導核心形成了各自獨創性的黨風建設理論。

sentences.english: The Pakistan Peoples Party and our family have had a three-generation relationship with China.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦人民黨和我們家族與中國有三代的友誼。

sentences.english: The third generation nails are safe and reliable implants.
sentences.chinese: 第三代髓內釘系統更安全可靠。

sentences.english: In that corner, I drew a three generations family, presenting two generations of mothers.
sentences.chinese: 我後來就在這空格里畫上祖孫三代，代表兩代的母親。

sentences.english: The UK hasn't had a gold standard for the past three generations.
sentences.chinese: 英國在過去的三代裏一直沒有金本位制。

sentences.english: Three generations live in our house.
They held a family party at which all three generations were present.
sentences.chinese: 他們舉行了一個三代同堂的家庭聚會。

sentences.english: The third generation of museums in the world are those replete with / full of wholly novel concepts / notions / ideas.
sentences.chinese: 世界上第三代博物館是充滿全新理念的博物館。

sentences.english: During Xia, Shang and Zhou dynasties, Central Plains lay the core of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 夏商周三代文明，中原獨領風騷，居於全國中樞地位。

sentences.english: The views of the Three Generation Leading Group share the same root and keep pace with times.
sentences.chinese: 三代中央領導集體的發展觀既一脈相承，又與時俱進。

sentences.english: The thoughts on criminology originated in Xia, Shang and Zhou Periods in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代的犯罪學思想最早可追溯到夏商周三代時期。

sentences.english: This text intends to analyze the common ground of these leaders on human rights.
sentences.chinese: 本文擬對三代領導核心人權思想的共同點進行分析。

definition: secondary/twice in the year (of generations of insects, harvests etc)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

Five Dynasties, period of history between the fall of the Tang dynasty (907) and the founding of the Song dynasty (960), when five would-be dynasties were established in quick succession in North China
to have only one heir in a generation (of a family, clan etc)/to be learned from only one master (of a skill, art etc)
from generation to generation/generation after generation
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
